description: Looking for a healthy side dish? Try this nutritionally approved speedy wonder that's packed with flavour thanks to a tasty pepita pesto.
keywords: Pesto pasta,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan
name: Zoodles With Pepita Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 long red chilli, deseeded, finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil over medium-high heat. Add zucchini and cook for 1 minute or until just tender. Drain well.

Meanwhile, place oil, pepitas, chilli, basil, garlic and lemon juice in a food processor and process until smooth. Transfer to a large bowl and season with pepper. Add zucchini and 2 tbs water, then toss to coat. Divide among bowls and serve with extra basil and zest.
